public boolean isValidPasword(String password) {
  // check if password is null or empty
  if (StringUtils.isBlank(password)) {
    return false;
  }

  // check if the length of password is between 4 and 64
  int length = password.length();
  if (length < 4 || length > 64) {
    return false;
  }
    
  // check if password contains only a~z,0~9,dot
  for (int i = 0; i < length; ++i) {
    char c = password.charAt(i);
    if (!((c >= 'a' && c <= 'z') || (c >= '0' && c <= '9') || c == '.')) {
      return false;
    }
  }
  return true;
}

/**check if pwd valid
* @param pwd password
*
* @return true if valid, false else
* */
public boolean isPwdValid(String pwd) {
// check if pwd is null or empty
if (StringUtils.isBlank(pwd)) { return false; }

// check if the length of pwd is between 4 and 64
int length = pwd.length(); if (length < 4 || length > 64) { return false; }

// check if pwd contains only lowercase characters
if (!StringUtils.isAllLowerCase(pwd)) { return false; }

// check if pwd contains only a~z,0~9,dot
for (int i = 0; i < length; ++i) {
char c = pwd.charAt(i);
if (!(c >= 'a' && c <= 'z') || (c >= '0' && c <= '9') || c == '.') { return false; }
}
return true;
}

/**check if pwd valid
* @param pwd password
*
* @return true if valid, false else
* */
public boolean isPwdValid(String pwd) {
// check if pwd is null or empty
if (StringUtils.isBlank(pwd)) { return false; }

// check if the length of pwd is between 4 and 64
int length = pwd.length(); if (length < 4 || length > 64) { return false; }

// check if pwd contains only lowercase characters
if (!StringUtils.isAllLowerCase(pwd)) { return false; }

// check if pwd contains only a~z,0~9,dot
for (int i = 0; i < length; ++i) {
char c = pwd.charAt(i);
if (!(c >= 'a' && c <= 'z') || (c >= '0' && c <= '9') || c == '.') { return false; }
}
return true;
}
